text: Mba gumgi, mbe fhum Noa tugen, mbe Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ kaadogi. Noa kegi tugen, tɨvi mbatɨgi guigira kɨvgi, Fhe Bakɨme vhemkora nen vhezar mbe nɨɨŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana Noan rarga kim, ana za won kema bakɨme muuŋgia thugi. Ana won kema bakɨme muuŋgia thugim, harathɨgi gumgira, mbe mba kema bakɨme vhen vergim, mbɨ bakɨme vhuuŋgia ndav, mbe khɨga mba kema fegim, Fhe Bakɨme taagiap mbe ndigim, mbe nzerara ki.
